definitions.definition: A person who is intentionally, physically, or emotionally cruel to others; especially to those who are weaker or have less power or privilege.
definitions.example: A playground bully pushed a girl off the swing.

definitions.definition: A noisy, blustering fellow, more insolent than courageous; one who is threatening and quarrelsome; an insolent, tyrannical fellow.
The small scrum in the Eton College field game.
Various small freshwater or brackishwater fish of the family Eleotridae; sleeper goby.
An (eldest) brother; a fellow workman; comrade
A standoff between two players from the opposing teams, who repeatedly hit each other's hockey sticks and then attempt to acquire the ball, as a method of resuming the game in certain circumstances.

definitions.example: You shouldn't bully people for being gay.
Bully, she's finally asked for that promotion!
